code: import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import classes from'./Counter.module.css';import{counterActions}from'../store/index.';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Counter=function Counter(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var counter=useSelector(function(state){return state.counter;});var show=useSelector(function(state){return state.showCounter;});var incrementHandler=function incrementHandler(){dispatch(counterActions.increment());};var increaseHandler=function increaseHandler(){dispatch(counterActions.increase(10));};var decrementHandler=function decrementHandler(){dispatch(counterActions.decrement());};var resetHandler=function resetHandler(){dispatch(counterActions.reset());};var toggleCounterHandler=function toggleCounterHandler(){dispatch(counterActions.toggleCounter());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:classes.counter,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Redux-Toolkit Counter"}),show&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.value,children:counter}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:incrementHandler,children:"Increment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:increaseHandler,children:"Increment by 10"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:decrementHandler,children:"Decrement"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:resetHandler,children:"Reset"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleCounterHandler,children:"Toggle Counter"})]});};export default Counter;
